issue.title: [C++] Bump version on Google Benchmark
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14961](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14961). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Google Benchmark v1.6.0 came out - I'd like to use a couple of functions it provides in a different issue.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14961?focusedCommentId=17452338) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Which functions are those?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14961?focusedCommentId=17452598) by Sasha Krassovsky (sakras):*
benchmark::CreateDenseRange and benchmark::CreateRange

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14961?focusedCommentId=17453179) by Ian Cook (icook):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11833
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11833>
